program main

    implicit none

    integer :: N, i, j, count, a, b, target, res

    integer, allocatable :: L(:)

    read *, N

    allocate(L(N)) do i = 1, N

        read *, L(i)

    end do

    call sort(L)  ! Need to sort the array

    count = 0

    do i = 1, N-1

        do j = i+1, N

            a = L(i)

            b = L(j)

            target = a + b

            if (j+1 > N) then

                res = 0

            else

                res = find(L, j+1, target)

            end if

            count = count + res

        end do

    end do

    print *, count

contains

    function find(arr, from, target) result(cnt)

        integer, intent(in) :: arr(:)

        integer, intent(in) :: from, target

        integer :: cnt

        integer :: low, high, mid, res

        low = from

        high = size(arr)

        res = from - 1  ! initial value

        do while (low <= high)

            mid = (low + high) / 2

            if (arr(mid) < target) then

                res = mid

                low = mid + 1

            else

                high = mid - 1

            end if

        end do

        if (res >= from) then

            cnt = res - from + 1

        else

            cnt = 0

        end if

    end function find

    !
